description: A user is a registrated person or client interacting with the VPDB API.
title: User

___email.description: The email address of the user

___created_at.description: Timestamp when the user was created.

___email_status.description: Status of the email address (see below).
___email_status.title: Email Status

___code.description:
Status code of the email. The following are valid values:
 * `confirmed` - Email address is confirmed.
 * `pending_registration` - Email address is to be confirmed after registration.
 * `pending_update` - Email address is to be confirmed after profile update.

___expires_at.description: Timestamp when the token sent by email expires. Only set if code not equals `confirmed`.

___value.description: The new email address that is about to be confirmed. Only set if code not equals `confirmed`.

___roles.description: List of roles the user belongs to.

___permissions.description: Set of permissions for that user, see [permission](/api/permissions).

___tablefile_name.description: A valid (Windows) file name for table names, without file extension. The following placeholders within curly brackets can be provided: `game_title`, `game_manufacturer`, `game_year`, `release_name`, `release_version`, `release_compatibility`, `release_flavor_orientation`, `release_flavor_lightning`, `original_filename`.

___name.description: Display name, initially set to user name.

___provider.description: How the user is authenticated. For local accounts this is set to `local`, otherwise to the name of the OAuth2 provider.

___username.description: Username used when locally logging in.

___is_active.description: Whether the user is able to login. Set to `false` to ban a user.
